pages.text: The creation and management of spells is be a complicated system to understand, and divided into multiple chapters.$(li)$(l:spells/introduction)The first introduction basic concepts, including imbuing.$()$(li)$(l:spells/introduction2)The second introduction covers the mechanics of imposing modifiers$()$(li)This entry covers the functional uses of modifiers and spells$()$(li)$(l:spells/library)The mechanics of the spell library and its uses$().
